summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment roll of L.I.D. No. 6687 for the improvement of S. Dakota St. from 6th Ave. S. to Airport Way S.; by paving the same with three inches of asphaltic concrete on the existing street surface; under Ord. No. 106392, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a local improvement fund.
